About St.George College

Discover more

About

St.George College

St. George College of Management, Science and Nursing is a well-known institution that was established in the year 1988. We as an institution do not stand alone but it is our students who are our standing pillars. It is our students to whom our missions and visions are entrusted upon. And it is our students that carry them forward perpetually. Our students represent different states in India and 24 foreign nationalities. The major attraction among the academic courses we provide are the MBA and BBA aviation programmes. These are both Industry Integrated Programmes with a plethora of industry experiences and insights. These are also supplemented with different industry integrated value added programmes to help our students reach the par of excellence. Our teaching-learning method is providing knowledge and value addition supplementing the academic programmes.

About

Affiliations & Recognitions

Discover More

Know More Here

St. George College of Management, Science & Nursing is a well-known institution was established in 1998 in Bangalore, the "Silicon Valley" of India, under the supervision and intervention of St. George Educational & Charitable Trust. In the first two years of commencement, it shot to the limelight of being recognized as one among the reputed Institutions in Bangalore providing Management, Science & Nursing courses for graduate and postgraduate programmes. In lieu of imparting high quality education the vision of the leadership team was to emancipate high quality education to students in various course disciplines. Our focus is imparting and creating knowledge in young minds. Our teaching fraternity and faculty are led by high knowledge personnel with vast teaching experience. Our students represent different states in India and 24 Foreign nationalities. Our teaching-learning method is providing knowledge and value addition supplementing the academic programmes.

Over the years we have built a good infrastructure supporting our academic programmes. Our support systems complement with science and computer labs and are equipped with state of the art facilities. Our library to create a wealth of knowledge for of books on varieties of titles & publications, computer labs and labs for conducting science experiments, amenities for sports and recreation. In 2002 we have established a new academic programme St. George College of nursing under the aegis of St. George educational & charitable Trust Bangalore runs St. George College of Nursing since 2002, affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi University of Health and Science (RGUHS) recognized by government of Karnataka and approved by Indian Nursing Council (INC) New Delhi, In the year 2011-12, we have initiated the MBA programme building budding management professionals, entrepreneurs. Our MBA programme is affiliated to Bangalore University approved by AICTE. Our MBA programme is deciphered with Industry Ready programmes. As an institution, our motto is Knowledge is Power

Discover More

Know More Here

An institution which believes in providing result-oritented, high quality education; education that develops and builds capabilities and fosters a sense of confidence. The world is surging towards liberalization, privatization and globalization calling for well meaning and competent professionals taking up the inceasing challenges globally. Such professionals are meager in number when compared to the real requirements in the business world today. No wonder that the professionals are the highest income earners! Identifying this dire necessity St. George College of Management, Science and Nursing endeavours to bridge the gap by imparting the chosen educational needs. Globalization and Liberalization have penetrated every sphere of human activity including that of education.

To provide the present generation with affordable quality of education as also to encourage maintain the human and spiritual values that our country has always cherished, had become the greatest challenge for Indian Society. It was to address this calling that St. George College of Management and Science was founded in 1998 by visionaries who are the trust members of this Institution. The College of Nursing was added later. Offering the students a good quality education to facilitate their newly awakened Talents to match an array of opportunities for their personal growth, the entire college machinery to put on full operation. St. George College constantly tries to upgrade itself with latest technology, managerial skills and teaching methodology to motivate the students in realising their hidden potential and creative ability.
